content: This is a **list of equipment of the [Republic of Singapore Navy](/wiki/Republic_of_Singapore_Navy)**, the [naval](/wiki/Naval_warfare) [service branch](/wiki/Military_branch) of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) (SAF). It is subdivided into vessels, aircraft, and weapons. ## Vessels ## Aircraft AircraftImageTypeVariantsOriginQuantityNotesHelicopters[Sikorsky SH-60 Seahawk](/wiki/Sikorsky_SH-60_Seahawk)Multimission maritime helicopterS-70B [United States](/wiki/United_States)8Serve in frigates.Unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV)[Boeing-Insitu Scaneagle](/wiki/Boeing_Insitu_ScanEagle)Unmanned aerial vehicle [United States](/wiki/United_States)*Unknown* ## Weapons ### Ship/submarine missiles ModelImageTypeVariantsOriginQuantityNotesSurface-to-air missile (SAM)[Aster](/wiki/Aster_(missile_family))Vertically-launched surface-to-air missileAster-15Aster-30 [France](/wiki/France)/ [Italy](/wiki/Italy)*Unknown*[MICA](/wiki/MICA_(missile))Vertically-launched surface-to-air missileVL MICA-M IR [France](/wiki/France)*Unknown*[Mistral](/wiki/Mistral_(missile))Manportable surface-to-air missileSIMBAD-RC [France](/wiki/France)*Unknown*[Barak 1](/wiki/Barak_1)Surface-to-air missile [Israel](/wiki/Israel)*Unknown*Anti-ship missile (AShM)[Harpoon](/wiki/Harpoon_(missile))Anti-ship missile [United States](/wiki/United_States)*Unknown*Capable of being launched from submarines[Blue Spear SSM](/wiki/Blue_Spear)Anti-ship missile [Israel](/wiki/Israel)/ [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)*Unknown*Developed as a joint venture between IAI and ST AerospaceTorpedoes[A244-S](/wiki/A244-S)[Torpedo](/wiki/Torpedo)Mod.1Mod.3 Italy*Unknown**Unknown*[Black Shark](/wiki/Black_Shark_torpedo)[Torpedo](/wiki/Torpedo)NSPBSA [Italy](/wiki/Italy)*Unknown**Unknown*[TP617](/wiki/Torped_613)[Torpedo](/wiki/Torpedo)*Unknown**Unknown* [Sweden](/wiki/Sweden)*Unknown**Unknown*Export variant of Torped 613 - [List of equipment of the Singapore Army](/wiki/List_of_equipment_of_the_Singapore_Army) - [List of equipment of the Republic of Singapore Air Force](/wiki/Republic_of_Singapore_Air_Force#Equipment) Portals: - History - Asia
title: List of equipment of the Republic of Singapore Navy
